Class RMINetworkServer

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.RMINetworkServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkServer
public final class RMINetworkServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkServer

An RMI network server responsible for providing an RMI connection.
